snippet: After an article on sexual abuse at a Bronx private school appeared in The New York Times Magazine, former students volunteered new recollections of mistreatment by teachers.
abstract: Former students of Horace Mann School in the Bronx volunteer accounts of sexual harassment and abuse by former teachers after an article on sexual abuse at the private school appears in The New York Times Magazine.

byline.contributor: Jenny Anderson and Ariel Kaminer contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: After an article on sexual abuse at a Bronx private school appeared in The New York Times Magazine, former students volunteered new recollections of mistreatment by teachers.
